mapper.select: select t1.parentItemCode itemCode,t1.parentItemName itemName,sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0)) count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, parent.id as parentItemCode, parent.item_name as parentItemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb, hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo parent where hcb.parent_item_code = parent.id and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital, count(*) cnt from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date<= #{endDate} + 1 group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital group by t1.parentItemName order by t1.seqNo

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.parent_item_code = #{parentId} and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital, count(*) cnt from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital in (select id from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo where parent_item_code = #{parentId} and id in and length(item_code)=10) and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date<= #{endDate} + 1 group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.seqNo

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from ( select b.hospital||'-'||b.dept_code itemCode,b.dept_name itemName from ods.dept_dict b where b.hospital=#{hspId} ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital||'-'||t.dept_code itemCode,count(*)cnt from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital= #{hspId} and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date<= #{endDate} + 1 group by t.hospital||'-'||t.dept_code ) t2 on t1.itemCode=t2.itemCode order by ifnull(t2.cnt,0) desc

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.cnt,0)count from ( select sd.hospital||'-'||sd.dept_code||'-'||sd.emp_no as itemCode,sd.name as itemName from dc.staff_dict sd where sd.hospital=#{hspId} and sd.dept_code=#{deptCode} ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital||'-'||t.dept_code||'-'||t.doctor itemCode,count(*)cnt from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital=#{hspId} and t.dept_code=#{deptCode} and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date<= #{endDate} + 1 group by t.hospital||'-'||t.dept_code||'-'||t.doctor ) t2 on t1.itemCode=t2.itemCode order by ifnull(t2.cnt,0) desc

select b.itemCode itemCode,b.itemName itemName,ifnull(sum(b.newCount),0) countNew,ifnull(sum(b.oldCount),0) countOld from ( select hcb.id as itemCode,hcb.item_name as itemName, case when t.visit_date>#{startDate} and t.visit_date <= #{endDate} then 1 else 0 end newCount, case when t.visit_date>#{startDate} and t.visit_date <= #{endDate} then 1 else 0 end oldCount from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb left join dc.clinic_master t on t.hospital = hcb.id where hcb.id in ) b group by b.itemCode,b.itemName order by b.itemCode

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from (select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.id in ) t1 left join (select t.hospital hospital, count(*)cnt from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date<= #{endDate} + 1 group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.itemCode

select t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.count,0) count from ( select t.charge_type itemName, count(*) count from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital in group by t.charge_type) t1 left join ( select t.charge_type itemName, count(*) count from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date<= #{endDate} + 1 group by t.charge_type) t2 on t1.itemName = t2.itemName order by t1.itemName

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,t2.dateData dateData,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.id in ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital,date_format(t.visit_date,'${dateFormater}') dateData, count(*) cnt from dc.clinic_master t where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date<= #{endDate} + 1 group by t.hospital,date_format(t.visit_date,'${dateFormater}') ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.itemCode
